content_html: The BC Hockey League (BCHL) is bringing its travelling hockey showcase back to Burns Lake. The league announced that the 2026 BCHL Road Show will take place Feb. 14 and 15, 2026 at Tom Forsyth Arena, featuring two regular-season games between the Prince George Spruce Kings and the Coquitlam Express. It will mark the second time the event has been held in Burns Lake, following a sold-out weekend in 2023. The league is again partnering with Lake Babine Nation to host the event. “We are thrilled to be returning to Burns Lake for the 2026 Road Show,” said BCHL Commissioner Steven Cocker in a press release. “The 2023 event was a huge success, with a sellout both games, so it was an easy decision to return.” Cocker added that the league was grateful for the support of Lake Babine Nation, saying the partnership made the return possible.
